project_abstract.cdata: The Second Bogota Water Supply Project will include a dam on the Chuza River, a 39 km conveyance system (consisting of 33 km of tunnels and 6 km of pipelines) from the dam to Bogota, additions to the city's distribution system, equipment, and engineering services.
